## vitepress-plugin-matomo package

A library to add Matomo tracking to vitepress router.

## Remarks

This injects Matomo default script to the page, while handling SSR. It requires access to Vitepress router to hook into `onAfterRouteChanged` event.

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [default\_2(parameters)](./vitepress-plugin-matomo.default_2.md) | Load Matomo in your vitepress project. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [IParameters](./vitepress-plugin-matomo.iparameters.md) | Interface for plugin parameters |
